## MatchArrayStructureOptions type

This method will match the structure of the current array against the target. This method will not match the length of the DigitizedValue\[\] arrays, but match lengths for groups. To ensure all structures have the same length, run matchStructureLength() after this method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type MatchArrayStructureOptions = {
    backwards?: boolean;
};
```
